Civic Musical Road.knownFor: Points of Interest & Landmarks , Sights & Landmarks
reviewComments: This is a funky type of attraction. A tune plays for several seconds as you drive along the road. Supposedly one of only two roads in the world like this.
Totally worth the exit off the 14 freeway! If you have never drove on a musical highway then its a must!
you are never going to experience this elsewhere - it's wonderful and fun! Well worth the trip. And make a u-turn and do it at different speeds, when traffic (which is sparse... read more
